name: InspectorButton
desc: An abstract base class for creating Material or Cupertino-styled inspector buttons.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is tapped.

fields.name: semanticLabel
fields.desc: The semantic label for the button, used for accessibility.

fields.name: icon
fields.desc: The icon to display within the button.

fields.name: buttonKey
fields.desc: An optional key to identify the button widget.

fields.name: variant
fields.desc: The visual and behavioral variant of the button.

fields.name: toggledOn
fields.desc: For [InspectorButtonVariant.toggle] buttons, this determines if the button is currently in the "on" (true) or "off" (false) state.
